sections.title: Family
sections.paragraphs:
Agnes and Philip had two children: [[Philip I, Count of Boulogne]] and [[Marie of France, Duchess of Brabant|Mary]], 
who were legitimized by the Pope in 1201 at the request of the King. Little is known of the personality of Agnes, beyond the remarkable influence which she seems to have exercised over Philip.{{sfn|Chisholm|1911|p=378}}

sections.title: Artistic representation
sections.paragraphs: She has been made the heroine of a [[tragedy]] by [[François Ponsard]], ''Agnès de Méranie'',{{sfn|Chisholm|1911|p=378}} and of an [[opera]] by [[Vincenzo Bellini]], ''[[La straniera]]''.
